org.opengoss.core.internal.registry
类 PluginServiceRegistry

java.lang.Object
  org.opengoss.core.Registry
      org.opengoss.core.internal.registry.PluginServiceRegistry
所有已实现的接口：
IPluginServiceRegistry, IRegistry, IServiceRegistry
public final class PluginServiceRegistry
extends Registry
implements IPluginServiceRegistry

Plugin level service registry.

版本：
1.0 2006-11-19
作者：
Ery Lee(ery.lee@gmail.com)

registerService

public void registerService(ServiceHolder holder)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Register a service.

This method is called by service builder, and not intended to be called by other clients.

参数：
holder - service holder
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
另请参见：
ServiceHolder

unregisterService

public void unregisterService(ServiceHolder holder)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Unregister a service.

This method is called when the plugin registry is destroyed.

参数：
holder - service holder.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception
另请参见：
ServiceHolder

build

public void build(ServiceRegistryBuilder builder)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Build the plugin registry.

This method is called by PluginActivator when a plugin starting.

参数：
builder - service registry builder.
抛出：
java.lang.Exception

destroy

public void destroy()
             throws java.lang.Exception
Unregister all the services registered by the plugin and destory the registry.

抛出：
java.lang.Exception
